wines.description: This artisanal selection delivers butter and creamy. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by layered notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: An exceptional 2020 wine featuring vanilla and peach. An outstanding example of its style and region.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of citrus and butter, followed by nuanced notes of vanilla. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by creamy and peach. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and refreshing, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Representing the 2019 harvest, this offers vanilla and velvety. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of earth and floral, followed by expressive notes of dark fruits. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, fruit-forward takes center stage, complemented by complex and balanced. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wines.description: A remarkable 2022 bottling displaying cherry and earthy. A versatile wine that pairs beautifully with food.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with expressive aromas of cherry and leather, followed by elegant notes of tobacco. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, red fruits takes center stage, complemented by smooth and earthy. The supple texture and refined structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The sustained finish is distinguished and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2024 expression showcases cedar and firm tannins. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with alluring aromas of oak and earth, followed by refined notes of floral. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The luxurious texture and structured structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The impressive finish is memorable and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wines.description: An exceptional 2019 wine featuring grass and citrus. An outstanding example of its style and region.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of gooseberry and passion fruit, followed by expressive notes of elderflower. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by crisp acidity and citrus. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and refreshing, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.
